metadata.name: Powershell Keylogging
metadata.comment: Adversaries may log user keystrokes to intercept credentials as the user types them.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-keystrokes')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-procaddress user32.dll getasynckeystate')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-procaddress user32.dll getforegroundwindow')))

output.summary: Adversaries may log user keystrokes to intercept credentials as the user types them.
